welcome_benefits: 2,500 Edge Miles on Completing 1 Transaction Within 37 Days of Card Issuance

Movie & Dining: Get Up to 25% off (Max ₹800) Twice a Month at Partner Restaurants via EazyDiner on a Minimum Spend of ₹2,500
Rewards Rate: 5 Edge Miles for every Rs. 100 spent on travel spends, 2 Edge Miles for every Rs. 100 spent on all other transactions excluding spends on Hotels, Airlines, and TRAVEL EDGE Portal
Reward Redemption: EDGE Miles Can be Transferred to Partner Airlines and Hotel Loyalty Programs. 1 EDGE Mile = 2 Partner Miles (Except Marriott)
Domestic Lounge Access: 8 With Silver Tier, 12 With Gold Tier, and 18 With Platinum Tier (Each Year)
International Lounge Access: 4 per annum under Silver Tier, 6 per annum under Gold Tier and 12 per annum under Platinum Tier
Insurance Benefits: 4 With Silver Tier, 6 With Gold Tier, and 12 With Platinum Tier (Each Year)

fees_charges.Rewards Redemption Fee: ₹99 + GST for Redemption of EDGE Miles and ₹199 + GST for Conversion of EDGE Miles to Partner Points
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Waiver for Fuel Transactions Between ₹400 and ₹4,000 (Capped at ₹400 Per Statement Cycle)
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the withdrawal amount (subject to min charge of Rs. 500)

product_details: Reward Points are earned as Axis Bank EDGE Miles.
2,500 EDGE Miles as a joining benefit.
5 EDGE Miles/₹100 on all travel spends with the card.
Cards are available in three tiers of membership: silver, gold, and platinum.
Bonus Edge Miles on reaching specified spending milestones with the card.
25% off up to ₹800 via EazyDiner at partner restaurants.
Complimentary access to domestic and international airport lounges.
